post.content:
## MXC Continues MVP Roll Out
MXC is sending out a call for new ambassadors, the first rollout of the MXC MVP is ongoing and we’re hosting an epic event during Berlin Blockchain Week next month. Welcome to this week’s news update.

MXC Ambassadors bring MXC to their local countries by writing content and answering questions in the local language, participating in the MXC Community, and planning local MXC Meetups. Though we are always searching for more Ambassadors, today I’m looking for an Ambassador from Indonesia, and an ambassador from Vietnam. If you live in either of these countries and would like to be an MXC Ambassador, please complete the ambassador application, linked in the description below.

Last week MXC1 announced the rollout of the MXC MVP, working to help cities reduce pollution, and provide cleaner air for their citizens. At MXC we believe very strongly that Air Pollution can be reduced, and that each person should have the ability to work towards creating a better environment. We’ll release more on how MXC enables you to do this, later this week.

Berlin Blockchain Week is right around the corner and we are hosting the largest, most exciting MXC event in the history of Berlin Blockchain Week. You can learn more about the event by heading over to the [event page on Eventbrite](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/block-party-berlin-blockchain-week-tickets-65678204277). If you want tickets, send an email to [hello@mxc.org](mailto:hello@mxc.org). Space is limited, so you’ll want to do this soon!
post.metaDescription: Last week, we showcased our first MVP. This week will see the continuation of MXC MVP roll out and further testing. Meanwhile, we are inviting more people to join the MXC mission.

post.content:
## MXC极域继续推出MVP

MXC极域正在向新的大使发出呼召，MVP的首次推出正在进行中，我们将在下个月的柏林区块链周期间举办一场精彩的活动。 欢迎来到本周的新闻更新！

MXC极域大使通过以当地语言撰写内容和回答问题，参与MXC极域社区以及规划本地MXC Meetups，将MXC极域带到当地国家。 虽然我们一直在寻找更多的大使，但今天我正在寻找一位来自印尼和一位来自越南的大使。 如果您居住在这些国家中的任何一个并希望成为MXC极域大使，请填写以下说明中链接的大使申请表。

上周，MXC1宣布推出MXC极域的MVP，致力于帮助减少城市空气污染，并为市民提供更清洁的空气。 在MXC极域，我们相信这可以有效地减少空气污染，并且每个人都应该有能力创造更好的环境。 我们将在本周晚些时候发布更多关于MXC极域如何帮助您实现这一目标的内容。

柏林区块链周即将来临，我们将举办柏林区块链周历史上规模最大，最激动人心的MXC极域活动。 您可以转到 [Eventbrite上的活动页面](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/block-party-berlin-blockchain-week-tickets-65678204277)，详细了解该活动。 如果您需要门票，请发送电子邮件至 hello@mxc.org。 人数有限，不要错过哦！
post.metaDescription: MXC极域正在向新的大使发出呼召，MVP的首次推出正在进行中，我们将在下个月的柏林区块链周期间举办一场精彩的活动。 欢迎来到本周的新闻更新！
